name: American Homes 4 Rent
description: American Homes 4 Rent (AMH) is a leading provider of high-quality single-family rental homes across the United States. Founded in 2012, the company has established a strong portfolio of homes designed to meet the needs of families and individuals seeking rental opportunities in desirable locations. AMH focuses on acquiring, renovating, leasing, and managing single-family homes in neighborhoods that offer a good quality of life. The company operates with a mission to provide affordable, quality housing while enhancing the living experience of its residents. With a commitment to leveraging technology and data analytics, American Homes 4 Rent streamlines property management processes and improves tenant satisfaction. The company emphasizes sustainability and community engagement, ensuring that its homes and neighborhoods are well-maintained and contribute positively to the local environment. As a publicly traded real estate investment trust (REIT), AMH seeks to deliver value to its shareholders through prudent capital management and strategic growth initiatives.

seo.meta_title: American Homes 4 Rent | Quality Single-Family Rentals
seo.meta_description: Explore American Homes 4 Rent (AMH), a leading provider of quality single-family rental homes across the U.S. Discover our commitment to community and resident satisfaction.

faq.question: What type of properties does American Homes 4 Rent manage?
faq.answer: American Homes 4 Rent manages single-family and multi-family rental homes.

faq.question: Who is the CEO of American Homes 4 Rent?
faq.answer: David P. Singelyn is the CEO of American Homes 4 Rent.

faq.question: Where is American Homes 4 Rent headquartered?
faq.answer: American Homes 4 Rent is headquartered in Agoura Hills, California, USA.

faq.question: What is the mission of American Homes 4 Rent?
faq.answer: The mission of American Homes 4 Rent is to provide quality housing and enhance the living experience of residents.

faq.question: When was American Homes 4 Rent founded?
faq.answer: American Homes 4 Rent was founded in 2012.
